languages.text: Вестовой, примчавшийся к Лорд-капитану, доложил, что один из часовых пропал. Вокруг места, где он нес стражу, обнаружили крупные следы, а также несколько капель крови.
A messenger rushes to the Lord Captain to report that one of the sentries is missing. Large tracks have been found near the sentry's post, as well as a few drops of blood.
languages.original_text: Вестовой, примчавшийся к Лорд-капитану, доложил, что один из часовых пропал. Вокруг места, где он нес стражу, обнаружили крупные следы, а также несколько капель крови.

traits.locale_text: A messenger rushes to the Lord Captain to report that one of the sentries is missing. Large tracks have been found near the sentry's post, as well as a few drops of blood.
A messenger rushes to the Lord Captain to report that one of the sentries is missing. Large tracks have been found near the sentry's post, as well as a few drops of blood.
A messenger rushes to the Lord Captain to report that one of the sentries is missing. Large tracks have been found near the sentry's post, as well as a few drops of blood.
A messenger rushes to the Lord Captain to report that one of the sentries is missing. Large tracks have been found near the sentry's post, as well as a few drops of blood.

languages.text: 一位信使急匆匆地向舰长大人报告，说有一名哨兵失踪了，失踪地点附近发现了大片足迹与几滴血迹。
languages.original_text: A messenger rushes to the Lord Captain to report that one of the sentries is missing. Large tracks have been found near the sentry's post, as well as a few drops of blood.

traits.locale_text: 一位信使急匆匆地向舰长大人报告，说有一名哨兵失踪了，失踪地点附近发现了大片足迹与几滴血迹。

languages.text: ひとりの使者がロード・キャプテンの元へ駆け込んでくる。見張りの一人が消えたという報告だった。その見張りが担当していた場所付近で大きな足跡と数滴の血痕が見つかった。
languages.original_text: A messenger rushes to the Lord Captain to report that one of the sentries is missing. Large tracks have been found near the sentry's post, as well as a few drops of blood.

traits.locale_text: ひとりの使者がロード・キャプテンの元へ駆け込んでくる。見張りの一人が消えたという報告だった。その見張りが担当していた場所付近で大きな足跡と数滴の血痕が見つかった。

languages.text: Un mensajero se apresura para informar {mf|al|a la} Lord Capitán de que uno de los guardias ha desaparecido. Se encontraron unas huellas enormes cerca del puesto del guardia, así como unas cuantas gotas de sangre.
languages.original_text: A messenger rushes to the Lord Captain to report that one of the sentries is missing. Large tracks have been found near the sentry's post, as well as a few drops of blood.

traits.locale_text: Un mensajero se apresura para informar {mf|al|a la} Lord Capitán de que uno de los guardias ha desaparecido. Se encontraron unas huellas enormes cerca del puesto del guardia, así como unas cuantas gotas de sangre.

languages.text: Un messager se précipite pour informer {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine} qu'une des sentinelles a disparu. De grandes traces ont été découvertes non loin de son poste, ainsi que quelques gouttes de sang.
languages.original_text: A messenger rushes to the Lord Captain to report that one of the sentries is missing. Large tracks have been found near the sentry's post, as well as a few drops of blood.

traits.locale_text: Un messager se précipite pour informer {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine} qu'une des sentinelles a disparu. De grandes traces ont été découvertes non loin de son poste, ainsi que quelques gouttes de sang.

languages.text: Ein Bote eilt zum Lord Captain und meldet, dass eine Wache vermisst wird. In der Nähe ihres Postens wurden große Spuren sowie einige Blutstropfen gefunden.
languages.original_text: A messenger rushes to the Lord Captain to report that one of the sentries is missing. Large tracks have been found near the sentry's post, as well as a few drops of blood.

traits.locale_text: Ein Bote eilt zum Lord Captain und meldet, dass eine Wache vermisst wird. In der Nähe ihres Postens wurden große Spuren sowie einige Blutstropfen gefunden.

languages.text: Bir elçi, Lord Kaptan'a nöbetçilerden birinin kaybolduğunu söylemeye geliyor. Nöbetçinin görev yerinin yakınında büyük izler ve birkaç damla kan görülmüş.
languages.original_text: A messenger rushes to the Lord Captain to report that one of the sentries is missing. Large tracks have been found near the sentry's post, as well as a few drops of blood.

traits.locale_text: Bir elçi, Lord Kaptan'a nöbetçilerden birinin kaybolduğunu söylemek için geldi. Nöbetçinin görev yerinin yakınında büyük izler ve birkaç damla kan görülmüştü.
